name: Office Cats: Cataclypse
description:
Your office building is being attacked by the Omega Cat and the lava is rising. Try and rescue as many of your coworkers as possible while you try to reach the roof. Tom Cat Cruise is waiting for you on the roof for helicopter extraction.

There are 11 cats to save in all

Controls: Pull back on thumbstick, or click and drag mouse, and release to be flung in the opposite direction (in the direction of the arrow)

Pressing any button/key will continue from a game over where you left off, and pressing Start/Esc will restart from the title screen.

Created for ICT game jam Winter 2020

Credits:

Aaron Root: Level Design, Programming

Kelly Ray Johnson: Programming, SFX

Peyton Stephenson: Modeling, Level Design

Andrew J Francis: Art, Modeling, Audio
